I'm using Weblogic 5.1 server and i want to test my
EJBs.

I'm also using JUnitEE.
I have put both JUnit.jar and JUnitEE.jar
But when I run my server and call the Test Servlet,
the server gives NoClassDefFoundError :
junit/htmlui/TestServletBase.

What might be the problem?

Siju.
